Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oAccepted by IEEE TCOM. This paper investigates the channel estimation of the near-field XL-MIMO scenario. We propose the mixed LoS/NLoS near-field XL-MIMO channel model and the corresponding channelestimation scheme. In
